1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Bracket type.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Tree.Bracket
7  ( -- * Bracket type
8    BracketType (..),
9    getBracketType,
10
11    -- * Open and close
12    bracketWith,
13    bracketGroup,
14    bracketTerm,
15    bracketList,
16    bracketSet,
17    bracketTie,
18    bracketRel,
19    bracketInterp,
20    bracketType,
21  ) where
22
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token          as S
26
27-- | Type of bracket.
28data BracketType
29    = BracketGroup    -- ^ __1.__ Round brackets for grouping:
30                      --
31                      -- > ( E ... )
32
33    | BracketTerm     -- ^ __2.__ Round-single brackets for term path:
34                      --
35                      -- > (- /N ... -)
36
37    | BracketList     -- ^ __3.__ Square brackets for lists:
38                      --
39                      -- > [ C | ... ]
40
41    | BracketSet      -- ^ __4.__ Curely braces for sets:
42                      --
43                      -- > { C | ... }
44
45    | BracketTie      -- ^ __5.__ Curely-single braces for ties:
46                      --
47                      -- > {- /N C ... -}
48
49    | BracketRel      -- ^ __6.__ Curely-double braces for relations:
50                      --
51                      -- > {= /N ... [ C | ... ][ C | ... ] =}
52
53    | BracketInterp   -- ^ __7.__ Curely-bar braces for data interpretation:
54                      --
55                      -- > {| ... /N ... |}
56
57    | BracketType     -- ^ __8.__ Square-single brackets for type:
58                      --
59                      -- > [- ... -]
60
61    | BracketForm     -- ^ __9.__ Round-bar brackets for calculation form:
62                      --
63                      -- > (| V ... | E ... |)
64
65    | BracketUnknown  -- ^ __10.__ Unknown bracket
66      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
67
68-- | Lower case name of bracket type.
69--
70--   >>> B.name BracketList
71--   "list"
72--
73instance B.Name BracketType where
74    name BracketGroup    = "group"
75    name BracketTerm     = "term"
76    name BracketList     = "list"
77    name BracketSet      = "set"
78    name BracketTie      = "tie"
79    name BracketRel      = "rel"
80    name BracketInterp   = "interp"
81    name BracketType     = "type"
82    name BracketForm     = "form"
83    name BracketUnknown  = "unknown"
84
85-- | Bracket type of token.
86getBracketType :: (Eq t, B.IsString t) => B.GetBracket BracketType (S.TToken t)
87getBracketType = B.bracketTable
88    [ BracketGroup   # bracketGroup
89    , BracketTerm    # bracketTerm
90    , BracketList    # bracketList
91    , BracketSet     # bracketSet
92    , BracketTie     # bracketTie
93    , BracketRel     # bracketRel
94    , BracketInterp  # bracketInterp
95    , BracketType    # bracketType
96    , BracketForm    # bracketForm
97    , (BracketUnknown, (S.isOpenToken, S.isCloseToken))
98    ] where br # p = (br, S.isBracketTokenOf p)
99
100-- | Enclose mix text in brackets.
101bracketWith :: (O.Bs, O.Bs) -> B.MixText -> B.MixText
102bracketWith = B.mixBracketS
103
104-- | Group bracket — @"("@ and @")"@
105bracketGroup :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
106bracketGroup = ( "(", ")" )
107
108-- | Term bracket — @"(-"@ and @"-)"@
109bracketTerm :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
110bracketTerm = ( "(-", "-)" )
111
112-- | List bracket — @"["@ and @"]"@
113bracketList :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
114bracketList = ( "[", "]" )
115
116-- | Set bracket — @"{"@ and @"}"@
117bracketSet :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
118bracketSet = ( "{", "}" )
119
120-- | Tie bracket — @"{-"@ and @"-}"@
121bracketTie :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
122bracketTie = ( "{-", "-}" )
123
124-- | Relation bracket — @"{="@ and @"=}"@
125bracketRel :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
126bracketRel = ( "{=", "=}" )
127
128-- | Interpretation bracket — @"{|"@ and @"|}"@
129bracketInterp :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
130bracketInterp = ( "{|", "|}" )
131
132-- | Type bracket — @"[-"@ and @"-]"@
133bracketType :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
134bracketType = ( "[-", "-]" )
135
136-- | Form bracket — @"(|"@ and @"|)"@
137bracketForm :: (B.IsString t) => (t, t)
138bracketForm = ( "(|", "|)" )
139
